section.title: Introduction
section.para:
This guide contains tutorials for the BioPreDyn software suite (version 0.1.0); it is assumed that the BioPreDyn software suite is installed on the machine, along with its dependencies. If not, please follow the instructions of the
prototype user guide.

All the tutorials use a simple model of enzymatic reaction as a reference model. This model, described in
Ashyraliyev et al. (2009), was written using QTAntimony. Its source code can be found at Prototype/data/training/FEBS_antimony.xml in the BioPreDyn software sources, along with all the work flow files described below.
